column4: Uhm, I just tried out the "System / Administration / Boot" tool, and it deleted my Windows entries in "/boot/grub/menu.lst"... Didn't even save a backup file it seems... Where am I to report this bug?

So no any one has any idea on the boot tool? --> "Uhm, I just tried out the "System / Administration / Boot" tool, and it deleted my Windows entries in "/boot/grub/menu.lst"... Didn't even save a backup file it seems... Where am I to report this bug?"
I changed the label on two W2K boot entries that were added by the 5.10 installer
Through the boottoolin the GNOME menu that is
did the same to me, eveytime it updates the kernel
